document_data.name: ''Arrowflight of Angels''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arrowflight of Angels''''' was an [[elf|elven]] enchanted [[longbow]] that once belonged to an [[Akh'Velahr]] war party leader, [[Victoria]], who died in the [[Weeping War]].
document_data.Description: ''Arrowflight of Angels'' was a delicately crafted elven bow decorated with [[angel]] wings.
document_data.Powers: Victoria's bow possessed a powerful ''+5'' enchantment and increased the user's constitution. ''Arrowflight of Angels'' gave the user ability to cast ''[[Resurrection (spell)|resurrection]]''.
document_data.History: During the Weeping War, Victoria led her elven war party against the invading [[Army of Darkness]] and met her demise in the [[Elven Catacombs]]. In [[1369 DR]], the [[drow]] of [[House Freth]] were smuggling elven artifacts from the catacombs under the city and Victoria's gear was among the items that were collected and prepared for transport. ''Arrowflight of Angels'' never reached the [[Underdark]] as a group of adventurers from [[Phlan]] destroyed drow operations in the Elven Catacombs.
